name: Hollow cube
description:
While traveling through the galaxy brave hero falls into a wormhole and finds himself in a strange empty space, spaceship broken, there is no connection, and in front of buzzing portal. Hardcore platformer about pain and suffering, about the desperate attempts to get out, to be able to our hero to overcome all difficulties and to get out or stay here forever.

Project need you support on Steam GreenLight

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
